    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/create_connect_request/info.rb, line 63

64:           return @children['answer'][:value]
65:         end
answer=(value)

REQUIRED summary: The answer that the patient is expected to provide when posed with the challenge question. remarks: It is recommended that this be a single word. The answer is case-insensitive, however, it is whitespace sensitive. An empty answer will result in an InvalidVerificationAnswer error. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Types::Stringnz

[Source]

82:         end
external_id=(value)

REQUIRED summary: An identifier supplied by the external application for the connect request. remarks: This value will tie the external application to the HealthVault record being shared. For instance, this could be the patient identifier used to store information in the calling application‘s database. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Types::Stringnz

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/create_connect_request/info.rb, line 75

friendly_name()

returns: a HealthVault::WCData::Types::Stringnz

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/create_connect_request/info.rb, line 29
29:         def friendly_name
30:           return @children['friendly-name'][:value]
31:         end
friendly_name=(value)

REQUIRED summary: A friendly name that will be presented to the user after the user successfully answers the challenge question. remarks: The friendly name should be something that is recognizable and distinguishes one connect request from another so that the user may choose the expected record during application authorization. For example, a mother of 2 children may want to name her connect requests after each child so she can distinguish one child‘s connect request from the others. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Types::Stringnz

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/create_connect_request/info.rb, line 24
24:         def friendly_name=(value)
25:           @children['friendly-name'][:value] = value
26:         end

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/create_connect_request/info.rb, line 46
46:         def question
47:           return @children['question'][:value]
48:         end
question=(value)

REQUIRED summary: A challenge question posed to the user once the identity code has been successfully entered. remarks: The challenge question should be personal and easy to answer for the user. It is recommended that the challenge question require a one word answer. An empty question will result in an InvalidVerificationQuestion error. value is a HealthVault::WCData::Types::Stringnz

[Source]

    # File lib/wc_data/generated/methods/create_connect_request/info.rb, line 41
